svg.title: Personalized Mastery Progression Tracker - Adaptive Learning Path System

svg.text: Adaptive Learning Path System with AI-Powered Recommendations

g.text: ‚Ä¢ Focus on repository analysis templates (15 min practice)

div.style: position: absolute; left: -10000px; top: auto; width: 1px; height: 1px; overflow: hidden;
div.div: Context Mastery progression track with advanced optimization level and repository analysis focus
Dynamic Planning progression track with sprint planning optimization and risk assessment integration
Code Evolution progression track with safe refactoring basics and performance optimization focus
Strategic Testing progression track with test strategy design and integration patterns
Intelligent Review progression track with review framework setup and acceleration techniques
